{% extends 'admin/base.html' %}

{% block content %}

    <form action='{% url 'settings' %}' method='post'>
        {% csrf_token %}

        <label for='default_base_currency'>Set Default Base Currency:</label>
        <select name='default_base_currency'>...</select>

        <label for='default_target_currency'>Set Default Target Currency:</label>
        <select name='default_target_currency'>...</select>

        <label for='update_frequency'>Set Update Frequency:</label>
        <input type='number' name='update_frequency' placeholder='minutes'/>

        <input type='submit' value='Save'/>
    </form>

</body>
